references.reason: This paper is a technical report for GPT-4, a highly influential large language model that has significantly impacted the field of AI and is frequently cited in the survey paper.

references.paper_title: LLaMA: Open and Efficient Foundation Language Models
references.reason: This paper introduces LLaMA, another important large language model that the survey paper frequently cites as foundational to this research area.
This paper introduces the concept of literature-based discovery (LBD), a key concept the survey paper builds on in its discussion of scientific hypothesis discovery.

references.paper_title: Large Language Models for Automated Open-domain Scientific Hypotheses Discovery
references.reason: This is a highly relevant paper published by two of the authors of the survey and makes a significant contribution to the field of scientific discovery using LLMs; it is referenced in multiple sections of the survey paper.

references.paper_title: DISCOVERYWORLD: A Virtual Environment for Developing and Evaluating Automated Scientific Discovery Agents
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel benchmark, DISCOVERYWORLD, which is relevant to the task of scientific discovery using LLMs and thus an important contribution that is referenced in the survey paper.
